import {React, useContext } from 'react'; import './game.css'; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import {gameContext} from "./GameProvider" export default function Normal(props) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const context = useContext(gameContext); let isHard = context.isHard; function goback(){ navigate(-1); } function onClick_rule(){ navigate('/rules'); } function onClick_unable_change(){ // change to pop up message console.log("cannot change") } return ( <>
Hard mode:
adf
); }
